* BrightBlade keeps her gun trained towards the door but then suddenly it 
buckles and comes crashing down, a familier and rather large sight pummls 
into the room.
She slamms her back against the far wall as Perndabot trips towards her, a 
rather surprised squeek coming from her.
There wasn't  single place to run, though, she wasn't about to be squished 
by a giant bot such as him.
BrightBlade shimmied out of the way and simply watched Perndabot head for 
the wall, looking at him with an expression that clearly said, " And I put 
up with this?"
